attributes.action: Allow 2023 students to have topic lists for GCSEs.
attributes.additional_details: Covid has stopped a lot of students from getting the correct education and are not prepared to sit GCSEs without help.
attributes.background: Give children in 2023 topic lists for GCSEs as covid has affected learning.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/611680
